name: Find Your Everything
description:
When it comes to love, we all start with nothing, but a little something is added with each relationship until you find your everything.

Search for your perfect match among the croud, some will mean more to you than others, maybe that’ll help.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • E - Interact
  • Escape - Quit

Made By:

  •  Art by @Kyx
  •  Game Design by @Diotins, @Kyx and @NCHammer
  •  Programing by @Diotins and @NCHammer
